title: Curecanti National Recreation Area: Cimarron
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Eating & Sleeping     Camping     Cimarron                Cimarron Campground              Cimarron Campground is located 20 miles east of Montrose on U.S. Highway 50 at the site of a historic narrow gauge railroad town. All types of camping from tents to medium sized RVs can be accommodated at Cimarron. All sites are first-come first-served, and the campground rarely fills. Railroad exhibits are adjacent to the campground, and Crystal Reservoir near Morrow Point Dam is approximately 1.5 miles away.
